thread.title: Beyoncé and Jay Z hold hands at Weinstein's pre-Oscar bash | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Beyoncé and Jay Z hold hands at Weinstein's pre-Oscar bash | Daily Mail Online

author: Bobbie Whiteman For Dailymail.Com
title: Beyoncé and Jay Z hold hands at Weinstein's pre-Oscar bash | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The Lemonade singer wisely stuck to water at the party while her husband, who seemed to be on great form, sipped champagne. The power couple arrived at the venue as Cynthia Erivo, Corbin Bleu and Chris Jackson were finishing a three-song set from the studio's upcoming movie adaptation of Tony winning musical In The Heights. Looking radiant: The beautiful 35-year-old showed off her baby bump in a low-cut, figure-hugging blue gown that also made the most of her decolletage Weinstein Company boss Harvey Weinstein asked the trio to repeat the first five minutes of the performance for Beyoncé and Jay Z, according to Eonline . The two danced in their seats and gave the trio a standing ovation before mixing and mingled with celebrity guests who were there to celebrate Lion, which is up for six Academy Awards. They include Best Picture, Best Supporting Actor for Dev Patel and Best Supporting Actress for Nicole Kidman. Another party: Beyoncé sparkled in a glittering red dress with a plunging neckline when she and Jay Z appeared at the Grammys at Staples Center on February 12 Look ravishing in red like Beyonce in a dress by Peter Dundas
